description: HPE Aruba Networking has issued its April 2024 security advisory detailing critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerabilities impacting multiple versions of ArubaOS, its proprietary network operating system. [...]
title: HPE Aruba Networking fixes four critical RCE flaws in ArubaOS

description: The US government is warning that pro-Russian hacktivists are seeking out and hacking into unsecured operational technology (OT) systems used to disrupt critical infrastructure operations. [...]
title: US govt warns of pro-Russian hacktivists targeting water facilities

description: Panda Restaurant Group, the parent company of Panda Express, Panda Inn, and Hibachi-San, disclosed a data breach after attackers compromised its corporate systems in March and stole the personal information of an undisclosed number of individuals. [...]
title: Panda Restaurants discloses data breach after corporate systems hack

description: The Hôpital de Cannes - Simone Veil (CHC-SV) in France announced it received a ransom demand from the Lockbit 3.0 ransomware gang, saying they refuse to pay the ransom. [...]
title: French hospital CHC-SV refuses to pay LockBit extortion demand

description: ​CISA warned today that attackers are actively exploiting a maximum-severity GitLab vulnerability that allows them to take over accounts via password resets. [...]
title: CISA says GitLab account takeover bug is actively exploited in attacks

description: Microsoft has confirmed customer reports of NTLM authentication failures and high load after installing last month's Windows Server security updates. [...]
title: Microsoft: April Windows Server updates cause NTLM auth failures

description: Microsoft says the April 2024 Windows security updates break VPN connections on Windows 11, Windows 10, and Windows Server systems. [...]
title: Microsoft says April Windows updates break VPN connections

description: Qantas Airways confirms that some of its customers were impacted by a misconfiguration in its app that exposed sensitive information and boarding passes to random users. [...]
title: Qantas app exposed sensitive traveler details to random users

description: A new malware named 'Cuttlefish' has been spotted infecting enterprise-grade and small office/home office (SOHO) routers to monitor data that passes through them and steal authentication information. [...]
title: New Cuttlefish malware infects routers to monitor traffic for credentials
